00199    /*
00200    * Get the parent Simulation by reference.
00201    */
00202    inline Simulation& SubSystem::simulation() const
00203    {
00204       assert(simulationPtr_);
00205       return *simulationPtr_;
00206    }
00207 
00208    /*
00209    * Get the parent System by reference.
00210    */
00211    inline System& SubSystem::system() const
00212    {
00213       assert(systemPtr_);

00217    /*
00218    * Get the Boundary by reference.

00221    {

00224    }

00226    /*
00227    * Get the number of molecules of a specific Species in this SubSystem.
00228    */
00229    inline int SubSystem::nMolecule(int speciesId) const
00230    {
00231       assert(moleculeSetsPtr_);
00232       return (*moleculeSetsPtr_)[speciesId].size();
00233    }
00234 
00235    /*
00236    * Initialize a System::MoleculeIterator for molecules of one Species.
00237    */
00238    inline void
00239    SubSystem::begin(int speciesId, System::MoleculeIterator& iterator)
00240    {
00241       assert(moleculeSetsPtr_);
00242       (*moleculeSetsPtr_)[speciesId].begin(iterator);
00243    }
00244 
00245    /*
00246    * Initialize a System::ConstMoleculeIterator for molecules of one Species.
00247    */
00248    inline void
00249    SubSystem::begin(int speciesId, System::ConstMoleculeIterator& iterator) const
00250    {
00251       assert(moleculeSetsPtr_);
00252       (*moleculeSetsPtr_)[speciesId].begin(iterator);
00253    }
